paper_abstract: One of the approaches adopted to generate multiclass classifiers from binary predictors is to decompose the multiclass problem into multiple binary sub-problems. Among the existing decomposition approaches, one may cite the use of Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAG) to combine pairwise classifiers. This work presents a study on the influence of the DAG structure in the performance obtained in multiclass problems when Support Vector Machines are used in the induction of the binary predictors.
paper_title: Design of directed acyclic graph multiclass structures
